aboutMe: I am an undergraduate student at SFU studying computer science and business. I have collaborated on building outstanding projects that helped build my teamwork and interpersonal skills. I am passionate about learning and about helping others to learn. As a mentor for Women in Computing Science (WiCS) club, I have inspired many young women to pursue a career in computer science.

projects.name: Connect Quest
projects.description: This social interaction app prompts users with a daily challenge to get themselves outside and engaging with their community. Completing the challenge awards a user with points so they can compete for high scores with their friends.

projects.name: Dine Buddy
projects.description: This Android app allows a users to login and find places on google maps to save.

projects.name: Chroma Scan
projects.description: This Java application allows a user to select a source image and find the complimenting and dominant color from the source image.

projects.name: Capture the Flag
projects.description: A fun and engaging website game for try/CATCH participants (high school female and non-binary students) to learn about some CS basics and info about SFU Women in Computing Science.

projects.name: Filomator
projects.description: A file management desktop application that monitors folders for incoming files and moves them to their destination. Users input where they want files to go, what files to monitor and when.

projects.name: Recipe Extractor
projects.description: This Chome extension pulls recipe information from a site and displays it to users.

projects.name: Reel Deal
projects.description: An immersive Android game where users search for the fishes implemented in Java. Users can choose how difficult they want to play and compete to improve their high scores.

projects.name: Find It
projects.description: A play on the game spot it, users match images on the cards and compete for a better high score. This Android game algorithmically creates cards and shuffles them where exactly 1 image matches with another card. Users are also able to import images from Flickr using the Flickr API or from their photo gallery.

projects.name: CShell
projects.description: A command line interpreter that forks processes to allow multiple commands to be run efficiently and independently. Users can run a script of commands.
